Posts.Content: Update from the oncologist visit: The liver masses have decreased in size (Thank God) but the bone masses have increased in size. We are going to continue with the chemo and do another catscan in October. Thank you for your continued prayers and support.   HUGS   Mommaellen
Posts.Title: Updated Test Results

Posts.Content: I have an appointment with my oncologist and I am alittle scared.  This is a routine exam and I should not scared but I am.   Thanks in Advance to all who ride the bus with me.   Mommaellen
Posts.Title: My Pink Sisters, Can I get the pink bus for Monday Morning?

Posts.Content: Sending positive thoughts and prayers to you.    Ellen
Posts.Title: new cancer and bloody discharge have surgery date.

Posts.Content: I got the results of my mammogram and everything was clear.   Thanks everyone for being on the bus with me.    Ellen
Posts.Title: I am so happy...
Prayers needed now for Dawne please

Posts.Content: Sending prayers and good thoughts your way for thursday.
Posts.Title: I need the Pink bus lady's And Gentlemen
